page.title: 10The Community of Brynithel.
page.content: {Brynithel My Local Community written {by Paul Herridge and Huw Davies. Brynithel is a fairly large and close knit community.The Mount Pleasant and Penrhiw Estates make up Brynithel. There are two general stores the Spar,and Hammonds.We also have a fishshop and a PostOffice.There are three public bars one in Mount Pleasant,one on Cemetery Road and one near ST. Illtyds Church.We have a community centre which is used for bingo,dancing and on Sundays Chapel is held there.There is a youth club held up at the local football field and also one held in Tyr Graig School.Apart from youth club there is not much for the children of Brynithel to do.There is a park but without any swings.The nearest park or playground is in Aberbeeg or Llanhilleth.
